resources:
Android TicTacToe You go first. Your turn. Android's turn. It's a tie. You won! Android won! Human: 0 Ties: Android: info Are you sure you want to quit? Yes No Choose a Difficulty Level OKs Cancels Tic Tac Toe Against Android.

Difficulty Levels are:

Easy: Android Picks Random move
Harder: Winning move if available, otherwise random.
Expert: Winning move if available, block Human winning move, otherwise random. New Game Difficulty Quit About game
Easy
Harder
Expert
